LanguageData.PositioningEnabledExplained: Enables combat positioning for your mouse clicks/drags (see settings below)
LanguageData.AchtungModifierExplained: Holding this key will Force Draft colonists when they're given Move or Move-in-Formation commands. When held it will allow the selected colonists to be moved in their current formation at your cursor by holding and dragging the right mouse button. Once the right mouse button is held the Achtung! Key may be released. The formation can be rotated using Q and E
LanguageData.ForceCommandMenuModeExplained: Auto = normal behavior (draft status decides)\nShow Menu = Hold key for context menu\nSet Position = Hold key to order to position
LanguageData.IncreaseForceRadiusDesc: Increase the search distance for forced work (current radius is {0})
LanguageData.DecreaseForceRadiusDesc: Decrease the search distance for forced work (current radius is {0})
LanguageData.BuildingSmartDesc: Building smart prevents holes or getting stuck but is slower and always builds around your start location
LanguageData.Note1: When using Achtung the context menu contains both: drafted and undrafted commands
LanguageData.Note2: When positioning undrafted colonists along a line, a left click drafts colonists to their current positions
LanguageData.BreakLevelExplained: Set the break level at which a colonist stop a given Achtung job
LanguageData.HealthLevelExplained: Set the health status at which a colonist stop a given Achtung job
LanguageData.IgnoreForbiddenExplained: Ignores forbidden (red crossed) items when doing forced work
LanguageData.IgnoreRestrictionsExplained: Ignore zone restrictions when doing forced work
LanguageData.BuildingSmartDefaultTitle: Smart building is on for new Achtung! jobs
LanguageData.BuildingSmartDefaultExplained: Sets the default for how new jobs choose their build order
LanguageData.WorkMarkersExplained: Forced work is displayed with small markers
LanguageData.MaxForcedItemsExplained: Restricts the number of forced items for slower computers
LanguageData.CleanRoomDescription: Clean a room until it is completely clean
LanguageData.FireFightDescription: Fights a fire (even outside home zone)
LanguageData.SowZoneDescription: Sow a growing zone or room until it is completely sowed
LanguageData.CouldNotFindMoreForcedWork: {0} could not find more forced work. The remaining work is most likely reserved or not accessible.
